Luminaris.description: The weakened capital of Eryndral. Merchants whisper of shadows stirring beyond the gates.

Shademire Woods.description: Twisted trees block out the sun. The air feels heavy, and faint eyes glimmer in the dark. Strange runes have begun to appear on trunks.

Crumbling Catacombs.description: Ancient stone tunnels filled with stale air. Bones crunch beneath your feet. A faintly glowing font offers a moment of respite. A stair leads deeper into the earth.

Crumbling Catacombs - Depths.description: Deeper chambers of the catacombs. The air is colder and the bones are fresher — something undead stirs here.

Sunken Swamp (Edge).description: A soggy, reeking fringe of the Sunken Swamp. The ground squelches underfoot and strange lights drift between the reeds.

Sunken Swamp.description: A corrupted marsh where the soil drinks the light. Twisted plants and bog pools hide creatures and ruins of old rituals.

Rusted Sword.description: An old blade, chipped but still sharp enough to cut.

Leather Armor.description: Worn but serviceable armor, offers slight protection.

Healing Potion.description: A small vial that restores 10 HP.

Cultist Note.description: A folded note with inked runes. It mentions a 'Hollow Spire' and strange rituals.
Cultist Note.lore_text: The cult gathers at the Hollow Spire. They speak of a void beyond the Veil and the need to 'unmake the throne of light.'

Old Scroll.description: A brittle scroll, stained with age. Its script is faded but legible.
Old Scroll.lore_text: This scroll details the Celestial Veil's wards and mentions a scholar who once mapped weaknesses in the barrier. A name repeated in the margins: 'Elenya.'

Captured Letter.description: A blood-smudged letter found in the swamp. The handwriting is hurried and fearful.
Captured Letter.lore_text: To anyone who finds this—Elenya has been taken. They dragged her toward the Hollow Spire. Pray the Veil holds...

Lore Fragment.description: A torn scrap of a document mentioning the Celestial Veil.
Lore Fragment.notes: Collectible lore used to piece together Elenya's story.

Shadow-Touched Goblin.notes: A goblin warped by shadow; tied to Malveth's corruption.

Goblin.notes: A baseline goblin (legacy). Consider replacing with Shadow-Touched Goblin in later content.

Undead Wight.notes: A stronger undead found in the catacomb depths. Drops lore fragments occasionally.

Cultist.notes: A minor cultist who serves Malveth's followers; drops a note that unlocks lore.

Cultist Lieutenant.notes: A dangerous cult leader who coordinates rituals. Defeating them is a story quest.

Bog Horror.notes: A corrupted swamp creature, bound to the Sunken Swamp's rot.

Corrupted Bog Beast.notes: A tougher signature monster of the Sunken Swamp.

dialogue: Shadows are stirring in Shademire Woods.
We need brave souls to protect the kingdom.
If you can clear the catacombs of undead, the roads will be safer.
There are fragments of old knowledge hidden across Eryndral.
If you find a cultist's note or an old scroll, bring it to me — I may explain it.
Ask me about 'Elenya', 'Hollow Spire', or 'Veil' and I will share what I know.
May the light mend you, traveler.
I can restore your wounds, for free or coin depending on your need.

Clear the Woods.description: Defeat 3 Shadow-Touched Goblins in Shademire Woods.
Clear the Woods.lead_in: Shadows are stirring near the woods — we need help!

Investigate the Hollow Clues.description: Bring a Cultist Note or the Old Scroll to the Wandering Scholar in Luminaris.
Investigate the Hollow Clues.lead_in: These clues may point to the Hollow Spire — bring any notes to the Wandering Scholar.

Clear the Catacombs.description: Eliminate undead in the Crumbling Catacombs and its Depths (3 Skeletons or 1 Undead Wight).
Clear the Catacombs.lead_in: Bones grow restless below; we need that cleared.

Defeat the Cultist Lieutenant.description: Find and defeat the Cultist Lieutenant in Shademire Woods (may appear after investigating clues).
Defeat the Cultist Lieutenant.lead_in: A dangerous leader coordinates rituals—seek and end them.

Investigate the Sunken Swamp.description: Venture into the Sunken Swamp and recover evidence of ritual corruption (Collect Captured Letter or Lore Fragment).
Investigate the Sunken Swamp.lead_in: The swamp's corruption creeps outward; find proof of ritual activity.
